text:
[Verse]
Running through the night glow
City lights that shine so
Hearts in sync we will go
No plans just follow

[Verse 2]
Laughing in the downpour
Feet that hit the wet floor
Splashing like we want more
Joy we can’t ignore

[Chorus]
We dance dance in the rain
With no worries no pain
Our spirits unchained
Just love no refrain

[Verse 3]
Sidewalk is our stage now
People watch and ask how
We are free no end vow
Moonlight stays our brow

[Verse 4]
Silent street just us two
World so far from our view
Holding hands let’s push through
Sky dark but we knew

[Chorus]
We dance dance in the rain
With no worries no pain
Our spirits unchained
Just love no refrain
title: Dance in the Rain
